price: Y combatan por la causa de Dios a quienes los agredan, pero no se excedan, porque Dios no ama a los agresores.
arabic: وَقَٰتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتِلُونَكُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡتَدُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: waqātilū fī sabīli al-lahi alladhīna yuqātilūnakum walā taʿtadū inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu al-muʿ'tadīna
